content.text: Hi there, what are your hobbies?
My favorite hobby is reading comic books. I love the stories and the art.
That's awesome! I used to read a lot of comics when I was a kid.
What was your favorite comic book?
I really liked the X-Men. I loved the characters and the stories.
I love the X-Men too! They're my favorite comic book series.
What do you like about them?
I love the characters and the stories. They're so well-developed and interesting.
Yeah, they're great characters. I'm excited for the new movie that's coming out.
Me too! I hope it's good.
I'm sure it will be. The X-Men movies are usually pretty good.
Yeah, they are. I'm excited to see it.
